article_metadata.author: Janet Novack

og.description: Advice on filing your 2014 tax return and planning to reduce your family's taxes in 2015 and beyond, with special sections on retirement savings accounts, taxable investments and capital gains, and estate planning.
og.title: The Forbes 2015 Tax Guide
